titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Conference for Fulbright Scholars, Yale University, Records
Conference for Fulbright Scholars, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Wednesday January 9, 2019 at 11:34

did.unittitle: Conference for Fulbright Scholars, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of administrative files and correspondence concerning the 1962 Conference for Fulbright Scholars, which was sponsored by Yale University in cooperation with the Committee on International Exchange of Persons of the Conference Board of Associated Research Councils and funded by the United States Department of State.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 50 (YRG 50), Records of conferences and symposia at Yale.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred from the Graduate School of Arts and Sciences, 2004.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Conference for Fulbright Scholars, Yale University, Records (RU 953). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by topic.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of administrative files and correspondence concerning the 1962 Conference for Fulbright Scholars, which was sponsored by Yale University in cooperation with the Committee on International Exchange of Persons of the Conference Board of Associated Research Councils and funded by the United States Department of State.
